abstract: Editorial warns that China’s voracious consumption of Myanmar’s natural resources threatens to damage its environment and lives of citizens; points to dwindling forests and wild animal populations, as well as exploitation of local workers; says protests by people of Myanmar shows that they object to plunder of their country, and calls for Pres Thein Sein to stop corruption and cronyism.
lead_paragraph: China’s desire for everything from tiger parts to copper is threatening the environment and political stability.
snippet: China’s desire for everything from tiger parts to copper is threatening the environment and political stability.
